name: Lion’s Eye - MTG Card Manager
description:
Lion’s Eye - MTG features a beautiful and intuitive design with quick access to card information, legalities, and rulings.

iOS and iPad OS-first design
- Dark Mode.
- Context menus.
- Easy controls to sort categories.
- Multi-window support on iPad.
- Automatically created categories that sort your cards into folders for you.

Exceptional actions and tools
- Instantly search your collection by name, oracle text, and types.
- Dynamically sort your cards by Recently Added, Name, Color, Set/Number, Rarity, CMC, Type, and Price.
- Apple Shortcuts actions to get card images, oracle text, and rulings from anywhere across your device.

Fast and flexible search
- Search that includes support for Scryfall’s search syntax.
- Quick-add controls right in search results.

Scanner with PRO SCAN
- Single card scan including controls to look directly at card info or rulings.
- PRO SCAN to automatically scan cards into your collection, great for quickly building your collection.
